name: Welcome to #DBHangOps!
tagline: Talk shop and learn about MySQL and occasionally some other stores!
body:
### Welcome to DBHangOps!
DBHangOps is a bi-weekly google hangout meeting of various members of the MySQL community that simply want to talk shop about MySQL in their day-to-day and share fun learnings from working with MySQL and other data stores.  Also be sure to check out [#hangops](http://www.hangops.com), which was part of the original inspiration for DBHangOps!

### When's this?
DBHangOps happens every other Thursday at 11:00am Pacific (UTC -8).  You can follow the [@DBHangOps](https://www.twitter.com/dbhangops) twitter account to get up-to-date information about the next session, the link for the google hangout, and other interesting retweets!

### What do a bunch of DBAs talk about..?
Topics are always suggested by anyone attending the google hangout or via e-mail and twitter. If you have an idea for a topic that you'd like to see, definitely let us know!  If you're curious about previous topics, be sure to checkout the previous recordings on [the #DBHangOps youtube playlist](http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4vwzit7cI7Hv5QC5qNT_nIOVQreSkSpU&feature=c4-feed-u).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
